ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates mouse-dragging of SciChart: Overlays three series on a SciChartSurface and applies the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#ZoomPanModifier.html']ZoomPanModifier[/url]. This is a built-in ChartModifierBase derived class which adds the behavior of panning on mouse-drag. ChartModifiers can be added to the SciChartSurface via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.SciChartSurface~ChartModifier.html']SciChartSurface.ChartModifier[/url] property, or via a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.ModifierGroup.html']ModifierGroup[/url]
[b][i]Interactivity Options[/i][/b]
Change input button to start the pan operation, e.g. Left, Middle button (WPF Only) or Right Button
[b]Documentation links[/b]
- [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#What%20is%20the%20ChartModifier%20API.html']ChartModifiers provided by SciChart[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#ZoomPanModifier.html']ZoomPanModifier[/url]
ExampleDefinition.HelpText: Left-Button Drag to Pan the Chart
